pullRequest.title: [0.10] Rename unsignedPayload and ec2QueryName
pullRequest.bodyText:
Now that the aws.api#protocols and aws.api#auth namespaces exist, these
traits make more sense to be defined in those namespaces.
Issue #, if available:
Closes #281
Description of changes:
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,14 @@
 # Smithy Changelog
 
+## 0.10.0 (2020-??-??)
+
+### Breaking changes
+
+* aws.api#ec2QueryName was renamed to `aws.protocols#ec2QueryName`.
+* aws.api#unsignedPayload was renamed to `aws.auth#unsignedPayload` and no longer takes an array of values.
+  All auth schemes that honor this trait should be consider unsigned when this trait is applied.

@@ -102,4 +102,65 @@ Value type
             }
         }
 
+
+.. _aws.protocols#ec2QueryName-trait:
+
+------------------------------------
+``aws.protocols#ec2QueryName`` trait
+------------------------------------
+
+Summary
+    Indicates the serialized name of a structure member when that structure is
+    serialized for the input of an EC2 operation.

nodes.bodyText: This is a list of contents in the aws.api namespace, should the README contain new lists for aws.auth and aws.protocols?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ See the Smithy specification for details on how these traits are used.
 * `aws.api#service`: Configures a Smithy service as an AWS service.
 * `aws.api#arn`: Defines the ARN template of a Smithy resource.
 * `aws.api#arnReference`: Indicates that a string shape contains an ARN.
-* `aws.api#unsignedPayload`: Configures that request payload of an
+* `aws.auth#unsignedPayload`: Configures that request payload of an

nodes.bodyText: Should this instead be in the correct package within src/test?

beforeCommit.message:
Rename unsignedPayload and ec2QueryName

Now that the aws.api#protocols and aws.api#auth namespaces exist, these
traits make more sense to be defined in those namespaces.

afterCommit.message:
Rename unsignedPayload and ec2QueryName

Now that the aws.api#protocols and aws.api#auth namespaces exist, these
traits make more sense to be defined in those namespaces.

commit.message:
Rename unsignedPayload and ec2QueryName

Now that the aws.api#protocols and aws.api#auth namespaces exist, these
traits make more sense to be defined in those namespaces.
